entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicitly typed lambdas returning arrays can have unexpected oblivious element nullability #74609
  • Multiple compiler servers running (and consuming CPU) on Linux #74607
  • Implement generic interface method with `allows ref struct` constraint #74605
  • `F1` help for `allows ref struct` constraint #74604
  • Break points in source generated files don't bind. Source code is different from original version #74603
  • Fixing CS7036 (generate constructor based on base class) should give an option to use Primary Constructor #74602
    Backlog
  • This generator is not generating files. But build works fine #74601
  • [LanguageServerHost] InvalidOperationException: `The solution does not contain the specified document.` after renaming file in Visual Studio Code #74600
  • OrganizeDocument: ArgumentException: The specified SnapshotPoint is on a different ITextSnapshot than this SnapshotPoint. #74594
    17.11 P3

Closed

  • Copilot Rename Suggestions: No suggestions for identifiers referenced in methods that touch the end of file #74545

PullRequests

Created

  • Change SyntaxEquivalence.AreEquivalent to use a more appropriate pooling mechanism for the stack it uses to walk trees. #74610
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during SourceText serialization #74608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow more of Razor to use Roslyn Lsp types #74597
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unsupported servicing branches #74606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Rename Suggestions: Fix getting of the context string, gracefully handle errors #74564
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce the number of sourcetexts fully recreated from the tree during brace completion enter #74591
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Modify ISyntaxFacts methods to allocate less #74596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use the last computed navbar model until we get a new one. #74595
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update config for 17.12.P1 snap #74592
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix interceptors bugs involving ref this parameters #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
